name: The Hacker (itch)
description: Hacker is a game that i made with the help of taking a course since i wanna make video games now and this is my first ever game. It's very short and might as well be a flash game but i made this in unity ( the 2017 1.1 version). Hope you enjoy and over my course i will make other games and when i'm done i might join game jams and make a game i wanna create and make by myself. Thank you and may luck be with your side.
